name: Construct
description: A modron wields a wrench in the interior of a clockwork machine. This card signifies things made by hand, including Constructs.

person: An artisan who delights in handcrafted goods.
A person who scorns the idea of working with their hands.
creatureTrap: A construct, particularly designed to be animated (like a golem) as opposed to an ordinary object (like a broom or rug) that has been animated.
A creature able to destroy buildings and objects, such as one with the Siege Monster trait.
place: A garbage heap or another place where objects are discarded.
treasure: An exquisitely crafted art object (especially one with practical use) or magical tools.
An object fashioned with minimum ation of its raw materials, or a magic item useful against Constructs (such as a Mace of Smiting).
situation: An artisan attempting to bring a construct to life.
A rueful artisan attempting to destroy a Construct that has broken free of all restraint.
